channel.title: Ahh my crown has dissapeared
channel.description: ok, in my client.java i had 3 playerights but then i added another one, there was mod admin and owner, but i made owner (playerrights-3) co owner. i then did ctrl+f and typed "has logged in" then i got to the bit where it says something when u log in eg. owner, jack has logged in. so i added an owner has logged in thing and made it playerrights 4. then i saved it and compiled server then i restarted server and when i log in i have a crown and everything is right, until i find out no one else can see my crown!?!? how do i fix this?

item.title: Ahh my crown has dissapeared
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Well you see. playerrights 4 already existed, and exists in all servers

1 = mod

2 = admin

3 = owner

4 = hidden admin

You see you have not properly edited your variables,

The best option is to put your rights back to 3

Read full topic
